text:
Desimartini KRK says Anaarkali of Aarah will be a ‘disaster’, Swara Bhaskar has the perfect reply 
Actor Swara Bhaskar took on Kamaal Rashid Khan aka KRK on Monday after the latter said the upcoming film Anarkali of Arrah will be a ‘disaster’. Filmmaker Karan Johar shared the first poster of the film on Monday. bollywood Updated: Feb 21, 2017 11:31 IST Hindusatan Times Swara Bhaskar plays a singer in Anarkali of Arrah. 
Actor-filmmaker Kamal Rashid Khan is at it again. Just that this time, he’s taken on actor Swara Bhaskar’s Anaarkali of Aarah, and things aren’t really going his way. After KRK called Swara’s film a “disaster” on Monday, the actor took to Twitter and silenced the controversial director in the most epic way. Swara Bhaskar with the director of Anarkali of Arrah, Avinash Das. 
The actor-filmmaker-turned-self-proclaimed critic took to Twitter on Monday to slam Karan Johar and the film and pronounced that Anaarkali of Aarah will be a “disaster”. “Sir @karanjohar it will not be a flop or washout, but it will be super duper disaster of the year coz KRK says so,” KRK wrote. Read more 
Not one to take such things lying down, Swara took on KRK in her own style: “Kuch logon ki gaali, compliment hoti hai! :) Thanks @kamaalrkhan the unasked filth u spew is a character certificate for us! Appreciated.” Sir @karanjohar it will not be a flop or washout, but it will be super duper disaster of the year coz KRK says so. https://t.co/Ugu3GPfFxT — KRK (@kamaalrkhan) February 20, 2017 
Swara is all set for her upcoming release, Anaarkali of Aarah. Filmmaker Karan Johar shared the first poster of the film on Monday and Bollywood celebs are going gaga over Swara’s different, colourful look in the poster. Kamal Rashid Khan, however, has a different opinion. Kuch logon ki gaali, compliment hoti hai! :) Thanks @kamaalrkhan the unasked filth u spew is a character certificate for us! 🙏🏿 Appreciated. https://t.co/4rDCWQShio — Swara Bhaskar (@ReallySwara) February 20, 2017 
KRK replied clarifying on his part: “Madam @ReallySwara I don’t give Gaali to anybody, neither given you Gaali. I am just talking about a crap film as a critic so just chill.” Madam @ReallySwara I don't give Gaali to anybody, neither given you Gaali. I am just talking about a crap film as a critic so just chill. — KRK (@kamaalrkhan) February 20, 2017 
Clearly one who lives in his own bubble, KRK further tweeted, “Actually you @ReallySwara should be happy that #TheBrandKRK, the no.1 critic in the world is talking about ur film whatever it’s good or bad.” Actually you @ReallySwara should be happy that #TheBrandKRK , the no.1 critic in the world is talking about ur film whatever it's good or bad
